Other divisions include flexible and rigid shaft couplings, and production CNC machining to customer specifications.
Company Description by the company:
At first glance, Oren Elliott Products Machining appears to be a very modern company, with sophisticated state-of-the art equipment and metalworking techniques. Beneath the surface, however, lies a long tradition of precision machining in production quantities. We've been machining at our Plant I facility since 1925, when we produced screw-machined subcomponents for electromechanical assemblies under the name American Steel Packaging. At the height of production during World War II, American Steel Packaging (later to become All Star Products) produced millions of screw machine parts for the allied war effort.						

Since Oren Elliott purchased the company in 1983, we've expanded by adding a second plant and several pieces of capital equipment. Most of our new equipment has focused on computer numerically controlled (CNC) machining, with which we serve customers as close as 10 miles away and as far away as California and Maine, in such industries as automotive manufacturing, food processing More... equipment, robotics, semiconductor fabrication equipment, fluid power, and medical/orthopedic equipment, to name a few.						

 The most fundamental aspect of our corporate culture is an emphasis on customer service in the three areas most crucial to companies outsourcing machine work: quality, delivery, and price. Conformance to our customers' quality requirements is ensured by an enterprise-wide quality system based on the ISO9001:2008 standard. Rapid lead-time and on-time delivery result from accurate scheduling and the capacity for high throughput. Competitive pricing is achieved in two ways: first, our overall efficiency results in a low hourly shop rate: and second, our use of innovative, cutting-edge machining techniques results in shorter cycle times and fewer secondary operations (some examples of these techniques are illustrated in our case studies).						

 We pride ourselves on long-standing relationships with many of our customers, some of whom we've been able to provide design assistance (particularly in the area of manufacturability and cost reduction), JIT delivery, prototype and experimental parts, expedited deliveries when necessary, specific quality documentation or procedures (including PPAPs, SPC charts, material traceability, and so on), and turnkey manufacturing services. If you have a print you'd like us to look at, please contact us for a prompt, competitive quote. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: ISO 9001:2008 custom injection molding & contract manufacturing. Engineering, product development, mold building, injection molding, assembly, decorating. Proprietary, reconfigurable, steel R&D tooling is available. Multi-mold program management. Resin types include commodity, engineering, high-performance, and ultra-polymer. Industries served include medical, military, packaging, electronics, consumer, and industrial, transportation. Engineering/product development capabilities are industrial design, reverse engineering, rapid prototyping, material selection, design for manufacturing/assembly, mold design/building, and automation design/building. Company Description by the company:
Despite the fact that we live in a global world, again and again we hear our clients say they want someone close. Close means geographically close. Close means culturally close. Close means telling the truth. If you are in New York, New Jersey, Connecticut, or Pennsylvania, as 98% of our customers are, we are close to you.

Natech delivers can-do Americanism with a firm grounding in the German work ethic. Our founder, Gerd Nagler, immigrated to the US in 1962, after completing his training as a Master Toolmaker. In 1998, he founded Natech Plastics, the latest in a career of entrepreneurial successes. Natech is now in its second generation, led by Gerds eldest son, Thomas, who joined in 2000 after starting his career in technical sales at a Japanese steel keiretsu.

As a part of his forward-looking succession plan, Gerd sent Tom to earn his MBA from Columbia Business School where he met and later recruited David Kachoui as a member of the leadership team. Our clients come to Natech for help More... in making smart, informed decisions about their projects. Both leadership generations believe this is directly accomplished by talented engineers who have been developed into adept general managers who own the details. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer of fasteners including bolts, nuts, pins, rivets, screws, studs & washers. Distributor of control, plastic & metal knobs. Company Description by the company:
We're a US company located in Wheeling, Illinois, a suburb of Chicago. We have customers throughout the Americas and around the world, but primarily service North American manufacturers. Since 1948, we have a history of providing American industry low cost, quality products and service is a record of which we are extremely proud.

Whether it is contract or subassemblies manufactured in our wheeling facility, plastic knobs produced in Chicago, or automatic screw machine products produced in our two in-house factories, each member of our staff is proud of the products we provide.

We supply cold headed specials and locknuts produced in our in-house factories, along with bagged and specially packaged products. We maintain a complete line of standard fasteners located in our 5 acre, 100,000 sq. ft. facility stocking billions of standard parts for immediate shipment.We offer the greatest value to American companies using our customized inventory programs, whether J.I.T., Kanban, or a unique system More... developed to meet your company's requirements. 

 Serving companies from the "Fortune 500" down to one person operations, we treat each customer as unique, with different requirements, while striving to provide, and over 99+% of the time, total customer satisfaction. Many companies promise the best quality, service and low cost, but we have delivered on those promises since 1948. Less

Company Description by the company:
Stewart EFI ranks among the largest international suppliers of precision, progressive die and deep drawn metal stampings, slide-formed components, wire formings, and automated and secondary assemblies. 

Founded in Yonkers, NY in 1936, the company is well positioned to satisfy the demand for precision metal stamped components and assemblies from both domestic and overseas OEMs in the automotive, electrical, electronics, cosmetic, battery, medical consumer, and telecommunications markets. 

Dedicated to satisfying customer requirements, our engineers and designers produce over 8 billion parts per year. They work with tolerances as precise as 0.0005" (0.013 mm) and with materials ranging from stainless steels and copper alloys to more exotic materials such as inconel, beryllium copper, and monel. 

We work closely with customers to design parts that will simplify the manufacturing process, deliver cost-efficient price/performance and actually improve product quality. We design, build, produce, More... and maintain all of our in-house progressive and slide-form tooling and assembly equipment with an experienced staff of over 50 tool and die makers. Our 250,000-square-foot Yonkers headquarters/manufacturing facility boasts more than 160 presses, 50 multi-slide machines, and 200 custom-built wire forming and assembly machines. Less

Markets served include medical, defense, aerospace, power generation, automotive, filtration, electronic, appliance, transportation, building and construction, semiconductor, ammunition, oil/gas, plumbing, lighting and marine. RoHS and REACH compliant.
Company Description by the company:
About B. G. Peck Co., Inc.

Every part shipped by B.G. Peck is precisely tooled to meet the specific needs of the customer. Often, that level of precision involves consultation with the specifying design engineers. In fact, it's common for us to recommend different solutions; a more suitable material, for example, or a minor shift in blueprint specifications or tolerances.

We are also alert to cost-savings alternatives. Using a different material might yield equivalent results at a lower cost; a small change in configuration might save on materials, or a materials upgrade might enhance durability and reliability. Quite often, we've recommended consolidating parts production between two or more divisions within the same company - an innovative method for reducing costs which individual specifications might never have identified.

At B.G. Peck we bring a spirit of cooperation to our customer service. Anyone can take an order; we work as a team with our customers to get each part right the first More... time, and the next time, and the next time. That's how B.G. Peck has built so many long-standing business relationships.

 For a company our size, B.G. Peck has a remarkably sophisticated manufacturing plant. Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities ensure high precision, production speed and materials economy. These operations are supported by a powerful computer system, which allows instantaneous access to customer information. Responding to an incoming order, we can frequently report on materials availability, price and delivery date over the phone; ever quotations can often be handled immediately. What this means to our customer is a speedy disposition of requisitions - one less item requiring a follow-up.

 Our production facility, privately owned and operated, encompasses 50,000 square feet of manufacturing and warehouse space. This allows us to maintain an impressive inventory of materials, and to offer our customers the opportunity for Just-In-Time inventory management. We encourage our customers to issue blanket orders, taking advantage of as-needed delivery and volume pricing and have established ship-to-stock status with several customers. This approach is also made possible by B.G. Peck's superb relationship with our material suppliers, who work with us in the same flexible "vendor partnering" arrangement.

 Throughout many diverse industries, B.G. Peck enjoys an unsurpassed reputation for its high standards of precision and quality, which meet the ISO 9001 quality standards. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: ISO 9001:2008 certified. Electronic contract manufacturing, PCB (printed circuit board) assembly, PCB testing, PCB design services, & engineering design services. Turnkey services from initial product design, compliance engineering & testing through end of life sustaining engineering & support. Design & manufacturing engineering includes design review, design & development, PCB layout & design, mechanical design, design for manufacturability, compliance testing & support, prototype support, BOM & configuration control support, alternate sourcing for price & lead time reduction, stencil design, process development & improvement, test fixture & procedure development, documentation. Quality control includes test failures compliance, system failure analysis, component failure analysis. RoHs compliant.
Company Description by the company:
Zentech Manufacturing, Inc. is a private C-Corp company and a highly certified, premier electronics contract manufacturing company offering PCB (Printed Circuit Board) assembly, PCB testing, and PCB design services since 1998. Additional certifications include ISO 13485:2003, AS9100:2009, ITAR Registered, and Clean Room certification.

Zentech operates two facilities in the Mid-Atlantic region, Balitmore, MD (headquarters) and Fredericksburg, VA. Both are ISO:9000 certified and house equipment and controls to handle the latest printed circuit board (PCB) assembly technology. Our equipment, systems, and processes are optimized for flexibility in building complex products that have medium volume/high mix requirements.

We thrive when our customers thrive, so we make every effort to help ensure the success of our customers. We provide our customers with a level of production/manufacturing engineering support that is second to none. Our customers provide the product and market expertise while More... we provide the production expertise. We have found that this partnership relationship allows our customers to thrive and grow even when competing against lower-cost competitors from the Far-East or South and Central America.

 Zentech offers high speed, precision assembly of printed circuit boards. We provide a full range of PCB design, assembly, and testing services.

 Zentech's primary markets are defense and aerospace (55%), medical (25%), communications (10%), and industrial controls (10%). Less

Company Description by the company:
Toth Industries, originally founded in 1955 by Bernard Toth, still remains dedicated to his philosophy: "do whatever it takes to provide customers quality, precision-machined parts". Today we proudly and strongly reflect this in our relationships and partnerships with our customers. We machine solutions for our customers, not just parts. We adapt our production and schedule to meet your expected needs and we will deliver your parts anywhere in the country for just-in-time delivery.

Toth Industries dedication to customer service is still the cornerstone of our operation. It is but one of the reasons we have received numerous awards and recognition from our customers. We remain to this day, a valued parts supplier to major companies in the United States and throughout the world.

Our engineering department uses state-of-the-art CAD/CAM and computer programming to take your product from blueprint to final product faster. Our skilled operators together with production capabilities in high-speed More... lathes and multi-axis machining centers allow us to get the job done quickly with a high degree of quality. Our schedule is your schedule. We also recognize that, despite careful planning, emergencies will happen. Our flexible tooling and computerized equipment allow us to meet nearly any unexpected demand. Trust Toth Industries for your next project needs! Less

Company Description by the company:
Pacific West America, Inc. (PWA) is a vendor to procurement supply chains. We provide electronic manufacturing services (EMS) such as CNC machining, metal stampings, RF cable assemblies, RF connectors, printed circuit boards (PCB), flex-circuits and membrane switches. We have been in business for twenty-one (21) years.

A specialty of ours is selling custom RF cable assemblies that are flexible, semi-rigid and formable, with any combination of RF connectors such as BNC, Ultra Tiny BNC, 12G-SDI BNC, SMA, SMB, 1.0/2.3, 1.6/5.6, 2.4mm, 2.92mm (K), N, TNC, MCX, MMCX, BMA, FME, Mini UHF, Reverse Polarity, SSMA, SSMB, Waterproof Series, IP68 and more.

PWA has an extensive background in contract manufacturing and performs a wide range of electronic manufacturing services.

Company Description by the company:
As one of the leading plastic thermoforming companies, Grimm Brothers offers high-quality, cost-efficient alternatives to traditional injection molding.

With thermoforming, it is possible to avoid the substantial startup costs and extended time to market associated with injection molding. Many design features and specifications associated with injection molding, such as sharp detail and close tolerances are now possible in high- or low-volume runs with the Grimm Brothers technically advanced thermoform processes.

Whether high-tech medical device housings, rugged heavy equipment parts, or any one of countless other thermoforming applications, Grimm Brothers is ready to produce the parts you need.

Grimm Brothers offers a full range of thermoforming techniques, trimming and secondary operations, as well as world-class design, engineering and production skills. We encourage you to explore our website to learn more about the capabilities and record of accomplishment of Grimm Brothers. Please More... contact us with any questions that you may have or send us your request for quote.

 To better fulfill customer requirements, Grimm Brothers has recently expanded to include injection molding capabilities to its list of thermoplastics manufacturing operations.

 So now, from small parts to large parts, from short runs to long runs, simple to multiple part designs, whatever the plastics part you need, whether by thermoforming processes or injection molding, Grimm Brothers will suggest the best process for your project. Call today! Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer specializing in assemblies with small parts. Manufacturing capabilities include eyeleting, orbital & press riveting, hand soldering, resistance welding & ultrasonic welding. Bench assembly such as gluing, staking, forming, etc. Marking & decorating such as hot stamping & roll transfer printing. Secondary machining operations on metals & plastics. Packaging includes blister packaging, shrink wrapping & poly bagging as well as simple product packaging. Military specs. JIT delivery service.
Company Description by the company:
General Assembly & Mfg. Corporation is a contract assembler, performing a wide range of hand, power assisted and automated assembly and packaging operations. Founded in 1977 and incorporated in 1979, we have been a reliable source for assembly, packaging and manufacturing needs for 25 years.

We are located approximately 40 miles northwest of Chicago, and occupy 30,000 square feet of a 72,000 square foot building. Our manufacturing capabilities include eyeleting orbital and press riveting, hand soldering, resistance welding and ultrasonic welding. We also provide a wide variety of bench assembly such as gluing, staking, forming, etc. We do marking and decorating such as hot stamping and roll transfer printing, and we perform secondary machining operations on metals and plastics. Our packaging resources consist of blister packaging, shrink wrapping and poly bagging as well as simple product packaging.

Excellent control systems complement our manufacturing capabilities. Inventory and precesses More... are monitored by otder and by customer. Work in process, incoming materials an outgoing product are closely and consistently checked to stringent quality assurance procedures, all to ensure that the resulting product will meet or exceed the expectations of our customers. 

 The variety, size and complexity of the products we handle contrasts considerably. We assemble parts as simple as two-piece snap together toys to complex precision tools consisting of dozens of parts. We fabricate and test products as critical as gas mask drink tube assemblies and respirator breathing circuits. We manufacture assembles using components smaller than a grain of rice, and are equally adept at handling product as large as an office file cabinet. We process orders in almost any volume  hand assembly of hundreds of pieces per year to fully automated assembly of several million pieces per year. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Electronics manufacturing services specializing in PCBAs, low volume/high mix (LVHM) production profiles, custom wiring harnesses, cable assemblies & magnetics. Capabilities include 3D printing, coating systems, soldering, reworking, ICT and flying probe testing, x-ray, thermal testing, and router de-paneling. ISO 9001:2015, AS9100D:2016 (for aviation, space, & defense), and ISO 13485 (for medical devices) certified. Company Description by the company:
REDCOM EMS: Prepared to help our customers succeed.

We are now almost six years operating as an EMS provider. We have experienced the satisfaction of leveraging our 30+ years experience as an OEM designer and manufacturer of telecommunications hardware for the benefit of our new EMS customers. And we want to keep doing it.

We are especially excited about the opportunities to service those customers producing products that will fulfill the promise of the Internet of Things (IoT) products such as IoT Gateways and other "edge" data processing hardware products. We are on very familiar terms with the techniques and challenges related to manufacturing these kinds of "boxes" and the PCBAs within them. Real estate is usually in short supply, and that's why two-sided SMT is so important; we have selective soldering equipment, enabling us to efficiently produce this mixed-technology (SMT + through-hole) boards. We've designed and built boxes with extended operating temperature ranges, learning much More... about how to "keep cool", be it with careful heat sink selection or simply making sure that connecting cables do not interfere with convection flows. 

 Below is a list of equipment that makes up our new (2014) PCBA assembly line:

 - Universal Fuzion (48K placements/hour) 

 - MPM Momentum Stencil Printer 

 - Vitronics Soltec XPM 3i 820 Reflow Soldering System 

 - KISS-104 Automated Selective Solder machine

 - Vi Technology 5K SPECTRO Automated Optical Inspection

 - Air-Vac Engineering ONYX 29 Advanced SMT Production Rework & Assembly. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of military electrical generator systems, ground support equipment & related components & controls. Fully equipped to design, manufacture & fully test mechanical, electrical or electronic systems, assemblies & components for particular specialty requirements. Products include aircraft power units, prime & stand-by generators sets, DC power supplies, load banks, floodlight sets, control panels & build to print assemblies.
Company Description by the company:
Essex Electro Engineers, Inc. ("Essex") was founded in 1964. Essex specializes in the design and manufacture of specialty electrical power equipment and solid state control modules. Essex's major customers have been the U.S. Military -- Army, Navy, Marine Corps, U.S. Coast Guard and the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA). A majority of the equipment is designed, manufactured and tested to meet stringent military specifications and FAA specifications. Throughout the past 35 years, Essex has designed and manufactured millions of dollars worth of special electrical equipment for both the government and commercial buyers. Some of the types of products Essex has designed and manufactured include motor generator sets, floodlight sets, power supplies, load banks, variable speed drives, transfer switch panels, engine generator sets, battery chargers and electrical switchboards. Essex's present facility of 50,000 square feet is fully equipped to manufacture the equipment on this program.

Essex More... has designed, manufactured and tested many integral parts of the primary equipment. These include solid state electronic modules such as voltage regulators, fault detectors, instrument transducers, electronic timers and sequence controls. These modules include PC board assembly and soldering to military standards and specifications. In many of our designs, Essex's engineers perform heat transfer and reliability analyses. The heat transfer may range from cool solid state components to cooling diesel engine components or high power rectifiers, which require gallons of coolant flow. In performing reliability analyses, Essex's engineers prepare program plans and tasks in accordance with MIL-STD-785, utilizing MIL-HBK-217 for the quality level of components. Essex has designed and manufactured computer controlled data acquisition and control systems to monitor and test production equipment. The data acquisition system includes the monitoring and controlling of voltage, current, relay contacts, solenoids and motors, recording these parameters onto a floppy disk and displaying the results on a CRT screen. Essex has a team of technicians and engineers experienced in the design, manufacturing and testing of generator sets, solid state power supplies and control systems. 

 Other support services Essex has available include on-site startup, training and maintenance service. In addition, Essex does have available assembly, wiring and testing services utilizing in-house test equipment which is calibrated and maintained in accordance with MIL-STD-45662. Essex has a complete inventory of such test equipment available for use as has been demonstrated by performance on many previous government contracts and commercial purchase orders. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of standard and custom LED lighting components including modules and printed circuit boards. Offers cool lighting, lead on board (LOB), horticulture, and LEDiL compatible modules and direct thermal path metal core printed circuit boards (MCPCBs). Available in linear, round, square, and star shapes and single and multiple LEDs in various configurations and specifications. Conventional MCPCB and FR4 printed circuit boards are also available. Suitable for low, mid, and high-power LED applications such as commercial, residential, street, high bay, area, grow, and landscape lighting. Provides F.O.B. shipping. UL approved and RoHS compliant.
Company Description by the company:
ADURA LED Solutions (ALS) is changing the way LED lighting is transforming. Adura is a manufacturer of all types of LED modules and industry's highest thermally conductive SinkPAD printed circuit boards. As a leading global provider of efficient lighting module solutions, ADURA LED solutions today empowers its customers and business partners to become more successful by making their lighting fixture product highly efficient, running cooler (SinkPAD-II technology) and offering longer life. Our component lighting solutions deliver superior quality, highest reliability, and impressive energy savings to provide our customers with a strong competitive edge.

At Adura, we have designed LED lighting modules that are high performance, running cool, energy efficient, cost effective and easy to use and integrate into any type of LED lighting fixtures. The company continuously brings new innovations and state-of-the art cool lighting solutions to market by using our patent pending SinkPAD-II PCB More... technology. ADURA LED solutions is all about cool lighting. LEDs generate heat and the heat must be managed properly. Adura's cool lighting modules uses SinkPAD-II technology with the highest thermal conductivity in the industry; in excess of 200 W/m.K providing a high performance LED modules to help designers with best in class heat dissipation, longer life and better overall luminaire performance.

 As a leading manufacturer of high-quality LED modules in California, USA, ADURA LED solutions has gained high market shares, accumulated good reputation and credibility in the North America domestic market by offering excellent quality products with a competitive price and exceptional customer service. Company Description by Thomasnet: ISO 9001:2000 certified manufacturer of military equipment & supplies. Products include antennas, handsets, headsets, loudspeakers, panels, microphones, field telephones, helmets, cable assemblies, wires, communication consoles, switches, radio sets, masts, markers, helicopter parts & accessories, locomotive parts, telephone generators, controls & cords. Communication systems, digital audio systems & encryption systems are available. Contract manufacturing services are available for automotive & electromechanical assemblies & plastic molds. Capabilities include injection molding & co-development & production. Products are suitable for military applications.
Company Description by the company:
CJ has years of experience in the manufacturing and logistical service of military electronics and communication equipment. After producing the components for the AN/VIC-1 vehicle intercom system in the 1980s, it seemed like a normal progression to supply the cabling and audio products associated with military vehicular communication systems. Today, we have complete product lines of handsets, headsets, microphones and speakers, as well as cable assemblies and cabling products and our original product line of communication systems that made us the quality company we are today.

CJ maintains production facilities just outside of Ft. Wayne, Indiana, while having offices just east of New York City. We maintain co-operation agreements with our tool and die /injection molding partners in Ft. Wayne. Most of the support or sub-contract facilities used by CJ are located within driving distance of our production facility or offices. This gives us the ability to take care of our own tooling for the More... components we manufacture. We also maintain extensive inventories on the systems we support. All of this enables us to perform at a high level of productivity and on-time performance.

 CJ supports the standard range of tactical audio components. Our specialty, however, comes in the form of engineering our product line to meet your specification needs for your radio system. Products are upgraded, new technologies are added and new products are developed. Examples of this are our newest line of handsets with crypto capability as well as a complete range of handsets and headsets with electret microphones. CJ has a state-of-the-art modern production facility for our audio products. The microphone and earphone elements as well as the PTT switch assemblies are completely manufactured in-house. Latest audio end electrical test equipment is used and each product on average is tested up to four times during assembly. Services not done in-house, such as tool & die and injection molding, are performed locally with partners. All this gives us the ability to control the quality standards we strive for and the on-time delivery the customer demands. In March of 2001, CJ Components completed setting up its quality control systems and procedures to meet the specifications of ISO9001/2000. In June of 2001, we were audited and became a certified and registered ISO 9001/2000 firm. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Distributor of controls and energy solutions. Various products include starters, riveters, staplers, nailers, tools, switches and meters. Alarm systems, compressors, control panels, fuse, heaters and lighting sytems are also available. Capabilities include engineering, design, construction, contracting, support, repair, programming and technical litigation. Education, healthcare, mining, natural gas, water, waste water, manufacturing and government industries served.
Company Description by the company:
HSC is a diversified corporation which provides regional services to private and public sector clientele. Our company is comprised of the following divisions: HSC INDUSTRIAL (Controls & Automation, Communications, Electrical Engineering & Contracting, and Industrial Tools), HSC BUILDING AUTOMATION & CONTROLS, and HSC MECHANICAL SERVICES.

HSC's Controls & Automation group provides SCADA and telemetry control system engineering, design, installation, start-up and support services to water, wastewater, mining, and other industrial clients who operate tanks, pumps, booster, and lift stations. 

HSC's Communications group provides sales and service for communications products that improve communications and enhance workplace safety. We provide two-way radios, satellite communications, repeaters, as well as bi-directional amplification, interoperability, mining communications systems and more. 

HSC's Electrical Engineering & Contracting group is a licensed electrical contractor providing engineering, More... design, construction and installation of custom electrical systems as well as equipment troubleshooting and repair services. We have a fully stocked electrical components warehouse and a control panel fabrication shop.

 HSC's Industrial Tools provides tools distribution, service and repairs for mining, manufacturing, construction, automotive and heavy industrial tools, including; compressors, electric and cordless tools, air tools, nailers, staplers, riveters, and water sanders. 

 HSC's BUILDING AUTOMATION & CONTROLS division is an authorized Automated Logic dealer providing building automation and controls products and systems. Services include: specification, programming, configuration, installation, and commissioning for building automation systems. In addition, we offer remote monitoring, troubleshooting, service, and support. 

 HSC's MECHANICAL SERVICES division is a Bryant Heating & Cooling System dealer providing sales, managed care and service of comfort systems for light commercial and residential clients. Projects involve new system specifications and installations or existing system repair, replacement, inspection, troubleshooting and seasonal maintenance. Regardless of the project, our technicians work to ensure your HVAC system provides maximum performance while operating efficiently and environmentally.

 Regardless of the project or need, HSC is a company committed to providing realistic solutions and continuing service "after the sale." Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer of aluminum extruded products. Extrusions include angles, channels, beams, pipe, tubing, reflectors, lighting, rails, tents, assemblies, heat sinks, bars, belt sander pulleys, tool mounting base, treadmill and rowing machine frames and circuit board and modem housings. Produces aluminum extrusions in solid, hollow and semi-hollow forms from 1/4 in. miniatures to widths up to 35 in. with wall thickness of 0.010 in. and tolerance of 0.001. Capabilities include mechanical finishing, powder coating, painting, packaging, 3D CAD designing, KANBAN and visual scheduling, computerized part routing, shop floor reporting and bar code scanning. Applications include lighting, electronics, automotive, information technology, telecommunications, construction, furniture and sporting equipment. Meets MIL STD-45208, MIL STD-105, ASTM, QS and Six Sigma standards. UL approved. JIT delivery.
Company Description by the company:
Northern States Metals (NSM) is a full service, multi-operational organization offering a full spectrum of extruded aluminum services including extrusions, fabrications, finishes, and assembly. From design to delivery, Northern States Metals single source accountability and employee commitment to quality and service guarantee creative and progressive solutions to our clients most difficult aluminum design and extrusion problems.

At Northern States Metals, we provide all the necessary services to be a one-stop-shop for all of your aluminum needs. We provide full turnkey solutions through extrusion, fabrication, finishing, and assembly providing our customers with a value-added experience. Most of our projects are custom. Therefore, we employ capabilities that allow us to custom engineer seamless aluminum extrusion designs.

Every client is assigned an account manager so you can have a direct point of contact for your project. The account manager oversees and handles your project from beginning More... to end. Clients choose NSM because of our commitment to providing the best cost competitive, value added solutions through our decades of experience in the aluminum extrusion industry and our strong network of suppliers.

 We have expanded our services to become your leading provider of aluminum through our exceptional history. No other company has our bankability coupled with our incredible, established relationships with other suppliers. Our impressive 44 years and counting of experience in the aluminum extrusions industry provide us with a very strong bankability story which ensures you that we are here to support you and your products well into the future.

 Our bankability, proven track record of success, and core manufacturing competencies make us the best choice for all your full turnkey aluminum service needs. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer of optical filters, sensors & coatings. Optical filters include dichroic filters, bandpass filters & tunable filters. Coatings including optical coatings & thin-film coatings for electrical circuits, optical fiber arrays, optical fibers, glass, lenses & beam splitters are also available. Capabilities include ion assisted deposition, ion beam pre cleaning /etching, computer controlled co-deposition of materials & thin film deposition, metallization & coating.
Company Description by the company:
We offer you Thin-Films technology made to order. Our technological capabilities include the growth of precision Thin-Films by various physical vapor deposition processes such as thermal evaporation, electron beam deposition, sputtering and ion assisted depositions. 

We can deposit multi-layers of metals or dielectric films, sequentially in a single pump-down. We can grow films of exotic alloys by computer-controlled, simultaneous depositions of two or more materials.

Housed in a specially constructed 3,500 square foot facility, which includes class-1000 equivalent clean-rooms and state-of-the-art equipment, the experienced staff of Thin-Films Research is prepared to meet your custom thin-film coating requirements.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Worldwide custom manufacturer of electronic controls or control systems. Etratech Inc. specializes in the design, development and manufacture of advanced electronic controls and control systems for major multinational companies. We serve original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and other manufacturing firms with a total solution that extends far beyond traditional electronic manufacturing services (EMS). Our specialty is in microcontroller-based products. Products include remote, motor, automation & equipment controls, temperature & environmental sensors, switches, interfaces, system control units & wireless communications. Capabilities include designing, global sourcing & product development. Industries served include appliance, automotive, HVAC, RV & marine. RoHS compliant. JIT delivery. Certified to ISO 9001/TS16949, ISO 14001 and ISO 13485.
Company Description by the company:
Etratech Inc. is a privately held corporation specializing in the design, development and manufacture of advanced electronic controls and control systems for major multinational companies. We serve original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and other manufacturing firms with a total solution that extends far beyond traditional electronic manufacturing services (EMS). Our specialty is in microcontroller based products.

Founded in 1989, Etratech employs more than 400 people worldwide. Our 50,000 square-foot facility in Burlington, ON houses complete product development, electronic engineering, automated production and value-added services under one roof. We also own and operate a 48,000 square-foot facility in Shenzhen PRC under the banner Etratech Asia-Pacific Limited, which specializes in turnkey design and manufacture of high-volume electronic controls and control systems for many international OEM's.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Specializing in system designing, panel building and installation. Custom manufacturer of various control panels and automation systems. Control panels, drives and servo systems are also available. Emergency services available.
Company Description by the company:
AMACON Systems Inc. (ASI) is a full-service Electrical Engineering, Automation, and Controls firm. Having been in business since 1992, ASI has a proven track record and will be happy to make your next project a resounding success.

Industrial Electrical Services:

	Construction/Project Management

	Arc-Flash Studies

	Load and Coordination Studies

	Facility Single Lines

	Power Factor Correction

	New/Existing Substation Installations and Upgrades

	NEC Compliance Studies

	Power Distribution Design

	Feasibility Studies and Budgetary Estimates

	Bid Packages

	Start-Up and Commissioning

	PLCs

	AC, DC, and Multi-Axis Servo Drive Systems

	Relay Logic Design

	Safety Circuits

	Loop Sheets

	P&ID Design/Updating/Creation

	Drum Programmers

	DCS Systems

	SCADA Systems

	Offsite System Monitoring

	Facility-Wide Programming Archives	

Machinery Upgrades:

ASI will invest the time to understand your requirements then propose solutions to help you reach or exceed your production and process More... goals. We also offer the convenience of using our facilities to perform upgrades of equipment before it is installed on site.

 Panel Building:

 We design and build panels of any size or complexity. ASI will build panels utilizing our specifications or yours. All panels are thoroughly checked for full design compliance before ever leaving ASIs facility. In some cases, utilizing our panel build service pays for itself. This is due to the expertise of our panel build staff and the design errors that will be corrected before the panel is built.

 Installation Services:

 We are a fully licensed electrical contracting firm. Whether you need a firm to act solely as the owners representative, a truly turnkey solution, or installation only, we are the firm you've been looking for. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer pf printed circuit boards and electronic components. Capable of fabricating prototypes and medium to large series of flexible, rigid-flexible and rigid multilayer PCBs. Company Description by the company:
Cicor Group - Innovation for success: 

Cicor is a solutions provider with worldwide operations and a globally unique portfolio of services and technologies. The latest discoveries combined with many years of experience, state-of-the-art technologies together with exceptional expertise make Cicor a dependable and innovate partner in the development and production of compelling solutions for every aspect of electronics. 

The Cicor Group offers comprehensive outsourcing services and expert consulting for electronic applications. As a complete solutions provider, we work with clients to develop innovative products and services that meet market needs while both staying abreast of the latest trends and ensuring effective practical application. 

Our broad portfolio of innovative technologies, services and global production capacities offer the right solution for even the most demanding needs such as high-tech and high-reliability applications. Consistent high quality, maximum traceability, rapid More... prototyping, flexible choice of materials, miniaturization, cost-control and development and assembly services make Cicor an excellent partner, meeting the needs with new ideas and innovative solutions. 

 Innovative technology solutions for every aspect of your electronics: 

 Cicor is an electronics service provider with an international structure and a broad range of production capabilities in printed circuit board assembly, system assembly and box building, control cabinet construction, cable assembly and in the areas of toolmaking and plastic injection molding. We offer complete outsourcing solutions for development and manufacturing of electronic component assemblies as well as complete devices and systems. As a company with global operations and production sites in Switzerland, Romania and Asia (Singapore, Vietnam, Indonesia and China), we employ our synergies to offer solutions based on long-term know-how. 

 Technological leadership through innovation: 

 As a leading manufacturer of sophisticated microelectronics and high-quality substrates, we offer a broad range of state-of-the-art products and services. In the area of microelectronics we can offer you the latest technologies in packaging, assembly and interconnection techniques. In the field of substrate manufacturing and processing, we are characterized by the production of highly complex rigid, flexible and rigid-flexible printed circuit boards and substrates using thin- and thick-film technology. In close collaboration with you, we develop and produce sophisticated products from prototype to large-scale production. Throughout, we offer the utmost process consistency and continually updated production facilities, to ensure customer satisfaction through consistent high quality with absolute adherence to delivery deadlines. Company Description by the company: About Lectronix, Inc.: Founded in 2002, Lectronix, Inc., conveniently located in the Midwest, is a leading supplier of turnkey electronic solutions, supporting OEMs of all size with regional to global requirements. The companys services group provides high-quality contract engineering and manufacturing tailored to any OEMs electronics needs, with a focus on exceptional customer service. The company has also developed proprietary specialty vehicle products, specifically commercial truck and public safety in-vehicle systems, incorporating the latest in safety, telematics, infotainment and navigation technologies on rugged Android platforms, several of which can be customized for ODM applications.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer & development of electronics, PCBs, repair parts, manufacturing parts, castings, pressure monitors, mechanical assemblies & emergency dialers. Services include OEM, prototyping, mechanical & electronic assembling, plastic & metal injection molding, printed circuit board designing & fabricating, hand inserting, reverse engineering, precision tool sourcing project consulting, product development & packaging. Markets served include Gov. funded agencies, consumer electronics & musical instruments.
Company Description by the company:
- Mechanical and Electronic Assembly 

From PC boards to cell phones we offer one-stop shopping for complex assembly jobs, including engineering and manufacturing services should you need them.

- Plastic Molding

Specialing in finding the perfect plastic molding solutions for your manufacturing needs

- Metal Injection Molding

Process is perfect for producing small and complex-shaped parts with outstanding mechanical properties that are equivalent or more desirable than wrought steel.

- PC Board Design

Capable of making printed circuit board in all categories: Multi-layer, Double sided, Flexible board, FR-1, FR-2, FR-4 and SMD.

- PCB Fabrication

Low cost efficiency, multiple board layers and a varying board thickness to fit any model. We also use only the highest quality materials and composites.

- Hand Insertion

Hand insert capability gives manufacturers maximum precision for all of their products whether theyre looking for RoHS compliant solder baths for assembling their PCB boards or are More... creating a unique product that needs a human touch.

 - Product Redesign

 Whether you want to upgrade a preexisting machine or more current style, we offer the best in product redesign services across the globe.

 - Reverse Engineering

 Reverse Engineering services allow us to take any mechanical device or software component and generate a similar machine or software platform without directly copying the original.

 - Product Sourcing

 Aggressively search for the products that you need, and will source items from new factories by using our diverse industry contacts. Just let us know the specs, numbers, and target price and we take care of everything.

 - Software Design

 Whether you want to create a plug-in to enhance your preexisting software or you need a new platform built from scratch our expert coders are able to provide you with the tools that make your life easier.

 - Packaging Services

 take your packaging ideas from concept to delivery, offering complete packaging services to give your products the extra mileage theyll need to travel the road toward success. From package graphics to silk screening services, OSI does it all.

 - Software Unlocking

 If you dont know the code to your current integrated circuit software for whatever reason and would like make it once more without going through the long and expensive process of re-writing everything again. Less
